column5: Hi all, I'm looking to buy a Minn Kota Terrova for this year but it seems to be out-of-stock nearly everywhere, however I've found a few on Amazon. Are these legit? Has anyone brought one from them before? Thanks, Reuben
id check the fishin hole...seems like they have them in stock.
I have bought a lot of things on Amazon and never had a problem.if it's new, it should have the full warranty.
Yes it’s safe. Just check they have free return on that product

If you're buying direct from Amazon there shouldn't be any problem at all.   	Amazon also sells for third party suppliers.  There may be some risk from a third party supplier; but even that risk is small.
